text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Chobe District | native_name = | native_name_lang = tsn | type = District | image_skyline = Zebras chobe national park.jpg | image_alt = | image_caption = Game area in Chobe National Park | nickname = | motto = | image_map = Botswana - Chobe.svg | map_alt = | map_caption = | mapsize = frameless | coordinates = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | established_title = | established_date = | founder = | named_for = | seat_type = Capital | seat = Kasane | government_footnotes = | leader_party = | leader_title = | leader_name = | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = | area_note = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = | population_as_of = 2011 census | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_note = | timezone1 = Central Africa Time | utc_offset1 = +2 | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code_type = | area_code = | website = | footnotes = }} Chobe District is a district in Botswana. The capital city is Kasane. Chobe National Park is in the Chobe District. Other tourist attractions are Pandamatenga Farms, Lesoma Memorial Monument, Kasane Hot Springs and Chobe River. Chobe district was established in July 2008 and is not sub-divided. ==References== Category:Districts of Botswana
title: Chobe District
